title: "Security Safe Deposit" still bank

description: square black bank safe; sides and top decorated with raised mirrored scrollwork design and \"line and dot\" bands at edges; 4 rounded feet; hinged door with 2 turning dials to operate lock; dog, camel, donkey, rabbit, duck and elephant images on door front; coin slot at top
